metadata.title: CVE-2020-25638 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in hibernate-core in versions prior to and including5.4.23.Final. A SQL injection in the implementation of the JPA Criteria APIcan permit unsanitized literals when a literal is used in the SQL commentsof the query. This flaw could allow an attacker to access unauthorizedinformation or possibly conduct further attacks. The highest threat fromthis vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: libhibernate3-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
